# hex2bin_chunked

Convert ASCII Hex to binary

**Browser**
var sample_img_data='';

var b64data=hex2bin_chunked(sample_img_data, true); //2nd parm as true to get base64 data
var template=`<div><img height="200" width="400" src="data:image/jpg;base64,${b64data}"></div>`;

var tag = document.createElement("p");
tag.innerHTML=template;
document.getElementsByTagName("BODY")[0].append(tag);
window.scrollTo(0,document.body.scrollHeight);
